gramGrp.pos:
REPORT VB
or
VB
with
PREP
‘to’

sense.def:
To confess something
pomeni priznati nekaj, česar se sramujemo.

seg.quote: Perhaps I shouldn't confess this, but I did on one occasion forge Tony's signature.
I confess to a certain weakness for puddings.
He once confessed to Vita that he really hated parties

sense.def:
To confess to a crime
pomeni priznati, da smo zagrešili zločin.

seg.quote: Bianchi had confessed to five of the murders.
